com.paydiant.android.core.service

Interface ITransactionManagerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransactionManagerService

    public interface ITransactionManagerService
    The Interface ITransactionManagerService.

    Warning: DO NOT reference the core.service package classes directly as these are missing the required business functionalities. Use core.facade or ui.service classes instead.

    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

      • retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo

        TransactionInformation retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String checkoutToken,
                                                                   int startIndex,
                                                                   int noOfRecords)
        Retrieve transaction details with split tender information.
        Parameters:
        checkoutToken - the checkout token
        startIndex - the start index
        noOfRecords - the no of records
        Returns:
        the transaction information containing split tender information
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the following status codes

        400 (BAD_REQUEST) - Not found.
        409 (CONFLICT) - Transaction in Use.
        419 (INSUFFICIENT_SPACE_ON_RESOURCE) - Invalid Checkout Token Scanned.
        406 (NOT_ACCEPTABLE) - Checkout Token Blocked.
        416 (REQUESTED_RANGE_NOT_SATISFIABLE) - Transaction Cancelled.
        417 (EXPECTATION_FAILED) - Transaction Timed Out.
        508 (LOOP_DETECTED) - Transaction Not Ready.
        500 (INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) -Internal Server Error.
        503 (SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE) - Invalid arguments.
        Since:
        3.5.0.1

      • retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo

        TransactionInformation retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String checkoutToken,
                                                                   int startIndex,
                                                                   int noOfRecords,
                                                                   Date startDate,
                                                                   Date endDate)
        Retrieve transaction details with split tender information.
        Parameters:
        checkoutToken - the checkout token
        startIndex - the start index
        noOfRecords - the no of records
        startDate - the start date
        endDate - the end date
        Returns:
        the transaction information containing split tender information
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the following status codes

        400 (BAD_REQUEST) - Not found.
        409 (CONFLICT) - Transaction in Use.
        419 (INSUFFICIENT_SPACE_ON_RESOURCE) - Invalid Checkout Token Scanned.
        406 (NOT_ACCEPTABLE) - Checkout Token Blocked.
        416 (REQUESTED_RANGE_NOT_SATISFIABLE) - Transaction Cancelled.
        417 (EXPECTATION_FAILED) - Transaction Timed Out.
        508 (LOOP_DETECTED) - Transaction Not Ready.
        500 (INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) -Internal Server Error.
        503 (SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE) - Invalid arguments.
        Since:
        3.5.0.1

      • makeSplitPayment

        PaymentTransaction makeSplitPayment(Payment payment)
        Payment Transaction supporting split tenders. This method should be repeatedly called until the PaymentTransaction.isPartialPayment() is a completed payment.
        Parameters:
        payment - Payment object containing the partial/full payment transaction information.
        Returns:
        PaymentTransaction object containing the details of the payment.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the following statusCodes

        503 (SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE) - Invalid Inputs.
        419 (INSUFFICIENT_SPACE_ON_RESOURCE) - Invalid Checkout token.
        417 (EXPECTATION_FAILED) - Operation Time Out.
        416 (REQUESTED_RANGE_NOT_SATISFIABLE) - Transaction Cancelled.
        406 (NOT_ACCEPTABLE) - Tender Type Not Supported.
        400 (BAD_REQUEST) - Transaction Declined.
        405 (METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED) - Insufficient Funds.
        501 (NOT_IMPLEMENTED) - Processing Error.
        504 (GATEWAY_TIMEOUT) - Invalid Card Number.
        505 (HTTP_VERSION_NOT_SUPPORTED) - Expired card.
        510 (NOT_EXTENDED) - Invalid Transaction.
        500 (INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error.
        410 (GONE) - Invalid Amount.
        402 (PAYMENT_REQUIRED) - Suspected Fraud.
        508 (LOOP_DETECTED) - Transaction Not Supported.
        409 (CONFLICT) - Transaction in Use.
        502 (BAD_GATEWAY) - Transaction Under Review.
        506 (VARIANT_ALSO_NEGOTIATES) - Invalid Payment Instrument.
        507 (INSUFFICIENT_STORAGE) - Invalid Billing Address.
        422 (UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY) - Merchant Error.
        420 (METHOD_FAILURE) - Tipping not supported.
        421 (DESTINATION_LOCKED) - Tipping error.
        423 (LOCKED) - Card Deleted.
        414 (REQUEST_URI_TOO_LONG) - Offer not redeemable.
        Since:
        3.5.0.1
